metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3583 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Ansible, where a user's controller is vulnerable totemplate injection. This issue can occur through facts used in the templateif the user is trying to put templates in multi-line YAML strings and thefacts being handled do not routinely include special template characters.This flaw allows attackers to perform command injection, which disclosessensitive information. The highest threat from this vulnerability is toconfidentiality and integrity.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
